comment._content: Daniel Appleton, Colonel and Commander of the New York Guard's Seventh Regiment from 1889 to 1916 Article in the NYT: THE ACHILLES OF THE NATIONAL GUARD.; Col. Daniel Appleton of the Seventh Regiment and His Deserved Popularity (query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=F10F17FD3A5F1A...) See also: www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=20455169

comment._content: Maneuvers of the National Guard of New York held at Camp Whitman,  Fishkill Plains, New York,  July 17th August 1st , 1915 .

comment.author: 33593953@N02
comment._content: Thanks for identifying Appleton and for connecting this and related photos up with the probable event. Although I haven't yet found this specific photo reproduced, I did find testimony that pictures of the proceedings were considered newsworthy in a New-York Tribune advertisement (July 23, 1915), seen via the historic American newspapers site, Chronicling America: chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn83030214/1915-07-23/ed-... (lower right). We'll add information when we next update the description.
